pr_title: Map some blocks, fluids and block entities

timeline.message: Map some block, fluid and block entities

timeline.bodyText: flowing or flowable? so is this like flowing water/lava excluding water/lava source blocks?
timeline.author: liach

replies.bodyText: Well rather it's a fluid that could flow, this includes the source blocks also
replies.author: i509VCB

replies.bodyText: Then probably FlowableFluid, flowing sounds like it only includes flowing water/lava
replies.author: liach

timeline.bodyText: We really need to slove this engima issue
